grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 鋭【エイ】sharpness, sharp weapon, blade, fine soldier
鋭意【エイイ】eagerly, earnestly, assiduously, diligently, wholeheartedly
精鋭【セイエイ】elite, best, pick, cream of the crop
kun reading compounds: 鋭い【するどい】sharp (blade), pointed, sharp (pain), stabbing, cutting (remark), stinging, pointed (question or look), screeching (noise), perceptive, keen, quick (mind), astute, shrewd, discerning, nimble, agile, quick
